physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#430 Sweet and Lewen Families, c 1908-1930 (Lakeside Amusement Park)." On back of photograph: "Leadville house c. 1923, Sept. This house belonged to Ray David. Albert & Mary Lewen were married in this house, #430."

mods.abstract: Exterior view of the Ray David home in Leadville, Colorado. Two unidentified women stand in front of the home.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
